text: Ara smarana kara, yakhana ibrahima balala, he amara palanakarta amake dekha'o, kemana kare tumi mrtake jibita karabe. Balalena; tumi ki bisbasa kara na? Balala, abasya'i bisbasa kari, kintu dekhate ejan'ye ca'ichi yate antare prasanti labha karate pari. Balalena, tahale carati pakhi dhare na'o. Pare seguloke nijera posa maniye na'o, atahpara segulora dehera ekekati ansa bibhinna paharera upara rekhe da'o. Tarapara seguloke daka; tomara nikata daure cale asabe. Ara jene rakho, niscaya'i allaha parakramasali, ati jnana sampanna.
